item.title: starlight
item.description: name: inverse layout: true class: center, middle, inverse --- # starlight .footnote[Go directly to [project site](https://github.com/gnab/remark)] --- layout: false # Research question ## When an alter is elevated in status, what does ego do? -- ### The question is typically star-centric -- ### Much is said about what happens to high-status actors after ascension - Performance suffers (Bothner, Kim, and Smith 2012) - Personal crises: ‘Oscar Curse’ (Jensen and Kim 2015) --- .
